# Daniel Tureck — Mix Engineer

> Daniel Tureck is a professional mix engineer at Robot Slap Studios in Long Beach, California.

## What He Does
- Music mixing: R&B, hip-hop, soul, pop, and live sessions
- Podcast mixing, editing, and sound design
- Commercial and branded audio production

## Notable Music Credits
- BJ the Chicago Kid
- James Vickery
- Justine Skye
- Arin Ray
- K. Roosevelt
- King Fantastic
- Daniel Kristoff
- Bestie
- Badi
- Everett Gabriel
- Morgan
- Cardigan Deville
- My Cousin's House
- Sterling Victorian
- Cameo Adele
- Blcknoise
- 3BlackKids
- Aye Mitch!

## Podcast & Brand Clients
- Disney (Percy Jackson & The Olympians Podcast)
- Audible (The Thin Line, What Could Go Wrong, Unsealed: The Tylenol Murders)
- Hulu (Tell Me Lies Official Podcast)
- Vox Media (Brene Brown - Unlocking Us, Sam Sanders - Into It, Vox Conversations, Galaxy Brains)
- iHeart Media (Fallen Angels, Whistle Blowers)
- MSNBC (Rachel Maddow - Bag Man)
- History Channel (Making Washington, Making Grant)
- Spotify (Peak 2000's)
- Stephen Curry (Greatest Sports Stories Never Told)
- Amy Poehler (Say More with Dr. Sheila)
- LA Times (Larger Than Life)
- Red Bull Records (SOUNDS Series)
- Manscaped (TV Commercial)
- CDPH (TV Commercial)
- Opera Web Browser (TV Commercial)

## Studio
Robot Slap Studios — a private hybrid studio in Long Beach, CA with analog summing, carefully selected outboard gear, and calibrated mains and subs for accurate low-end translation.

## Services
- Music mixing (R&B, hip-hop, soul, pop, live sessions)
- Podcast mixing and editing
- Sound design
- Audio mastering
- Scoring
- Commercial and branded audio

## Key Pages
- [Homepage](https://danismixing.com/): Music mixing portfolio with before/after audio demos
- [Podcasts & Brands](https://danismixing.com/podcasts/): Podcast and brand audio services, full client list
